entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
